dataAccess

Class DataAccess

  • java.lang.Object
    • dataAccess.DataAccess

  • public class DataAccess
extends java.lang.Object
    It implements the data access to the objectDb database

    • Method Detail

      • initializeDB

        public void initializeDB()
        This is the data access method that initializes the database with some events and questions. This method is invoked by the business logic (constructor of BLFacadeImplementation) when the option "initialize" is declared in the tag dataBaseOpenMode of resources/config.xml file

      • createQuestion

        public domain.Question createQuestion(domain.Event event,
                                      java.lang.String question,
                                      float betMinimum)
                               throws exceptions.QuestionAlreadyExist
        This method creates a question for an event, with a question text and the minimum bet
        Parameters:
        event - to which question is added
        question - text of the question
        betMinimum - minimum quantity of the bet
        Returns:
        the created question, or null, or an exception
        Throws:
        exceptions.QuestionAlreadyExist - if the same question already exists for the event

      • createFee

        public domain.Fee createFee(java.lang.Integer id,
                            domain.Question question,
                            java.lang.String pred,
                            double fact)
                     throws exceptions.ExistingFee
        It creates a Fee and stores it in the database
        Parameters:
        question - Question to which the Fee belongs
        pred - Possible answer to the question
        fact - Factor to multiply to multiply bet money in case of win
        Returns:
        Created Fee
        Throws:
        exceptions.ExistingFee - If the created fee already exists

      • createBet

        public domain.Bet createBet(float betMoney,
                            java.util.Date date,
                            domain.RegisteredUser u,
                            domain.Fee f,
                            java.lang.String description)
                     throws exceptions.ExistingBet
        Creates a bet, stores it on the database, and bet money is taken from the total quantity of the user
        Parameters:
        betMoney - Money that the user has bet
        date - Date of the chosen event
        u - User that has made the bet
        f - Chosen Fee
        description - Short description of the bet
        Returns:
        Created Bet
        Throws:
        exceptions.ExistingBet - If the created bet already exists
